Reviews.Title: Good Quality and Service
Reviews.Author: Ivan
Reviews.Content: Positive:1.- Excellent customer service2.- Good communication with the client3.- Good features and manufacturing of productNegative:1.- Only not fit with cases on the market, nothing serious for me.  (Yes FIT)( I recommend this seller )

Reviews.Title: excellent Phone
Reviews.Author: Luis Enrique Alvarado
Reviews.Content: just buy this phone and I do not regret buying at the moment excellent works all functions, bluethooth, 13 mpx camera, LED notifications is excellent. incredibly similar to the original, touch is amazing on the cover is equal to the original texture, Nfs Most wanted, angry bird go. Android is great the graphics, dual sim, flash is very weak, but it is a very good phone for tough to pay is incredibly good, jams would have the oportinidad buying the original note 3, so this option is very very good.the seller had to deal with me and are very friendly and attentive ... I thank you so much .... I recommend a thousand times this phone ... if you have any questions ask me .... thanks
